title: Mens Armored Checkered Flannel Biker Shirt, Multiple Waterproof Storage Pockets CE Approved Armor Reinforced Water Resistant
description: ✅ SIZE CHART: Check out our SIMPLE SIZE CHART FOR EXACT FIT.

✅ MULTI-POCKET: Our Flannel has high quality waterproof multi-pocket system that is designed for your everyday essentials. Easy access pockets provides snap-button pockets and inner pockets to keep your wallet safe.

✅ FUNCTIONAL & COMFORTABLE: Using Vance Leathers USA flannel your comfort and style is assured by a comfort that runs through the inner material. Front button closure with waterproof zipper closure provides protection and, reliability. It is a durable flannel and provides maximum mobility and comfort. A perfect choice for the all seasons, A perfect choice for all riders.

✅ CE APPROVED : The Vance Motorcycle Flannel is made with 90% Cotton & 10% DuPont(TM) KEVLAR(R) that is built out stand heat during the ride, and protect the rider. Designed with a Zip-Up closure for easy on and off experience.

✅ AFFORDABLE QUALITY: We manufacture our flannels with the highest quality materials at an affordable price. Our precision workmanship and classic look will keep you riding in style wearing biker gear built to last.
